submissionText:
Ok you guys are good, I'll do it...

So here's some fun facts about this tree:

To be honest, I'm not sure if it really is a tree, but it's like 4 meters high so I'm pretty sure it classifies as one?
It lives in my garden in Belgium!
This is the first time this tree ever got hugged* and I must say, it was an enjoyable hug.
Yes it was dark when I took the picture... you may force me to go outside, but you're not getting to fix my sleep schedule!! >:)

* Don't quote me on that, there might be some kind of serial tree hugger going around in our neighbourhood, you never know for sure.
